item.title: 风暴向澳大利亚袭来，关键铁矿石港口清空船只
item.description: 随着热带低压向西澳大利亚海岸移动，黑德兰港的铁矿石出口中心已开始清理船只，这是该地区今年与风暴有关的一系列干扰中的最新一次。【原文：The iron ore export hub of Port Hedland has started clearing vessels as a tropical low tracks toward the Western Australian coast, the latest in a series of storm-related disruptions for the region this year.】

item.title: 澳大利亚将为关键矿产和氢气提供税收减免
item.description: 根据预计将于周二在议会通过的立法，澳大利亚将为生产可再生氢气或加工关键矿物的企业提供税收优惠，这是澳大利亚中左翼政府为促进国内绿色产业和支撑供应链而采取的最新举措。【原文：Australia will provide tax incentives for firms that produce renewable hydrogen or process critical minerals under legislation expected to pass parliament on Tuesday, in the latest move by the center-left government to boost domestic green industries and shore up supply chains.】

item.title: 特朗普推翻拜登用纸吸管取代塑料吸管的行动
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统签署了一项行政命令，推翻了他的前任乔-拜登（Joe Biden）在联邦政府内部逐步淘汰塑料吸管并代之以纸制品的努力，将矛头指向了长期以来一直引起共和党人不满的环保改革。【原文：President Donald Trump signed an executive order reversing an effort by his predecessor, Joe Biden, to phase out the use of plastic straws within the federal government and replace them with paper products, targeting an environmental reform that has long drawn the Republican’s ire.】

item.title: 华盛顿州周二上班途中可能会下雪
item.description: 一场快速移动的暴风雪预计将于周二在华盛顿降雪，导致下午的通勤受阻，东海岸的航空旅行也可能延误。【原文：A fast-moving storm is expected to drop snow on Washington Tuesday snarling the afternoon commute and likely delaying air travel along the East Coast.】

item.title: 中国首次发行绿色债券是利用美国经济衰退的机会
item.description: 中国即将在伦敦上市首只主权绿色债券，这将考验国际投资者是否愿意将气候赌注转移到这个世界头号污染大国。【原文：China’s impending listing of an inaugural sovereign green bond in London will test appetite among international investors to shift climate bets to the world’s top polluter.】

item.title: 几乎可以肯定 "全球气温已经突破 1.5C
item.description:
两项新研究显示，去年创纪录的高温表明，化石燃料的燃烧已经使气候超过了一个关键阈值。【原文：

Two new studies reveal that last year’s record heat is a sign that burning fossil fuels has already pushed the climate past a key threshold.

】

item.title: 特朗普看中了哪些稀土金属？
item.description: 稀土是地球上最重要的原材料之一，深深融入了支撑现代生活的各种技术之中。然而，很少有人听说过稀土，也很少有人知道稀土的作用。【原文：Rare earths are among the most critical raw materials on the planet, deeply embedded in the technologies that underpin modern life. Yet few people have heard of them or know what they do.】

item.title: 印度不打算在 COP29 取得财政成果后提升气候目标
item.description:
在去年的联合国气候峰会上，该国是反对声音最强烈的国家之一，认为富裕国家在为发展中经济体筹集资金方面做得不够。【原文：

The nation was one of the most vocal objectors at last year’s UN climate summit, arguing that rich countries were not doing enough to raise funding for developing economies.

】

item.title: CATL 和 Lopal 不顾价格下跌重启中国锂精炼厂
item.description: 江苏洛玻科技股份有限公司和当代安培科技股份有限公司在中国的锂精炼厂在停产约五个月后将重新开工。江苏洛玻科技股份有限公司和当代安派科技股份有限公司在停产约五个月后，正在重启其在中国的锂精炼厂，这进一步威胁到这种关键电池金属的价格回升。【原文：Jiangsu Lopal Tech Co. and Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd. are restarting their lithium refinery in China after a roughly five-month halt, further threatening any price recovery for the key battery metal.】

item.title: 汽车企业高管撤下超级碗电动汽车推广广告
item.description:
电动汽车不再是美国最高价广告时段的闪亮新玩具。【原文：

Electric vehicles are no longer the shiny new toy to advertise during the US’s highest-priced commercial time slots.

】

item.title: 欧盟考虑免除汽车制造商巨额排放罚款的建议
item.description: 据该地区最大政治团体的一位资深立法者称，欧盟执行机构可能会在三月份提出一项解决方案，在坚持其雄心勃勃的绿色交通目标的同时，免除汽车制造商的排放罚款。【原文：The European Union’s executive arm may propose a solution in March to spare carmakers emissions fines while sticking to its ambitious green transport goals, according to a senior lawmaker from the region’s biggest political group.】

item.title: 一家初创公司在酷热时代将其汗液传感器推向全球
item.description:
随着工人们越来越多地暴露在高温环境中，Epicore Biosystem 的传感器可为他们提供洞察力

。【原文：

With workers increasingly exposed to high temperatures, Epicore Biosystem’s sensors can provide them with insight

】

item.title: 中国在让市场决定清洁电力价格方面迈出一大步
item.description: 中国正准备取消可再生能源的固定价格，让市场决定用户为清洁电力支付多少费用。【原文：China is preparing to scrap fixed pricing on renewable power, and let the market decide how much users pay for clean electricity.】

item.title: 美国企业称环境、社会和公司治理规则日益成为欧盟贸易的障碍
item.description: 在针对欧洲环境、社会和治理法规的批评者名单中，美国公司的声音越来越多。【原文：US companies are adding their voice to the list of critics targeting ESG regulations in Europe.】

item.title: 瑞士选民因经济问题拒绝接受排放限制
item.description: 瑞士选民在全民公决中否决了一套严格的排放限制，驳回了加强气候保护的呼吁，因为他们担心这会阻碍经济发展。【原文：Swiss voters rejected a set of rigid emission limits in a plebiscite, dismissing a call for more climate protection over fears that it would stymie the economy.】

item.title: 西班牙农村地区葡萄酒胜过风能开发
item.description: 今天的时事通讯关注西班牙农村地区的可再生能源设施如何进一步激化大城市与人口不足的乡村之间长达数十年的紧张关系。您还可以在 Bloomberg.com 上阅读和分享本篇报道。更多气候和能源新闻，请订阅。【原文：Today’s newsletter looks at how renewable installations in Spain's rural regions are further inflaming decades long tensions between big cities and underpopulated villages. item.title: 这是一个马戏团特朗普引发美国重要科学机构混乱
item.description:
作为世界顶级天气和气候预报机构之一，美国国家海洋和大气管理局（NOAA）的指令和清晨电子邮件混乱不堪，令该机构人心惶惶。【原文：

Muddled directives and early-morning emails at NOAA, one of the world’s top weather and climate forecasters, have put the agency on edge.

】

item.title: 中央电视台称中国西南地区山体滑坡造成 30 多人失踪
item.description: 据中国中央电视台报道，截至周六下午5点，中国西南部四川省宜宾市发生的山体滑坡至少掩埋了10户人家，30多人下落不明。【原文：A landslide in the city of Yibin of southwest China’s Sichuan province has buried at least 10 households and left more than 30 people unaccounted for as of 5 p.m. on Saturday, China Central Television reported.】

item.title: 西班牙农村地区支持葡萄酒而非风电场
item.description:
美国雄心勃勃的 2030 年清洁能源目标意味着在农村地区安装更多的可再生能源设备，这进一步激化了城市与农村之间的紧张关系。【原文：

The nation’s ambitious 2030 clean energy goals mean more renewable installations in rural regions, and it’s further inflaming tensions between cities and agrarian villages.

】

item.title: 大豆种植者敦促特朗普恢复对农业的气候补贴
item.description: 美国大豆种植者正在敦促唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府恢复对种植者根据拜登时代的一项计划采用气候智能做法的付款。【原文：American soybean growers are urging President Donald Trump’s administration to resume payments for growers adopting climate-smart practices under a Biden era program.】

item.title: 股价暴跌，生物燃料生产商绿色平原计划改革
item.description: 绿色平原公司（Green Plains Inc.该公司股价跌幅高达 20%，为 2020 年 3 月以来最大跌幅。【原文：Green Plains Inc. said it is reorganizing to slash costs as Chief Executive Officer Todd Becker struggles to expand the biofuels company into a seller of high-value products made from corn. Shares fell as much as 20%, the most since March 2020.】

item.title: 伦敦希思罗机场的第三条跑道为何备受争议
item.description: 在伦敦希思罗机场修建第三条跑道的想法从上世纪 80 年代就开始酝酿。但几十年来，英国的政治家们一直对此意见不一。【原文：A third runway at London Heathrow Airport is an idea that’s been kicking around since the 1980s. But it remains elusive, having divided politicians in the UK for decades.】

item.title: 特朗普政府停止扩展美国电动汽车充电器计划
item.description: 特朗普政府正在暂停对电动汽车充电器的联邦资助，这是对唐纳德-特朗普总统重新入主白宫后的第一批指令之一--取消美国对插电式汽车的补贴--的落实。【原文：The Trump administration is suspending federal funding for electric car chargers, following through on one of President Donald Trump’s first directives to roll back US subsidies for plug-in vehicles after he retook the White House.】

item.title: 美国办事处的效率令人惊讶

item.title: 纽约和东北部周末将迎来暴风雪
item.description: 从周六晚些时候开始，一场快速移动的暴风雪将给纽约市和东北部地区带来降雪，并将持续到周日上午。【原文：A fast-moving storm will bring snow across New York City and the Northeast starting late Saturday and persisting through Sunday morning.】

item.title: 北海项目为英国气候主管带来绿色难题
item.description: 英国能源大臣埃德-米利班德（Ed Miliband）不久将被石油公司要求批准一个新油田，而他之前曾批评该油田是 "破坏气候的行为"。【原文：UK Energy Secretary Ed Miliband will soon be asked by oil companies to approve a new field that he’s previously criticized for being “climate vandalism.”】

item.title: 美国在推动绿色办公楼建设方面超越欧洲
item.description:
一项新的研究表明，非洲大陆在房地产可持续性方面的声誉已今非昔比。【原文：

A new study shows the continent’s reputation for real estate sustainability isn’t quite what it used to be.

】

item.title: 日本称难以按时提交新气候目标
item.description: 日本环境大臣表示，日本很难在联合国规定的最后期限之前提交最新的气候目标。【原文：Japan’s environment minister said that it will be difficult for the nation to submit its updated climate targets by the deadline set by the United Nations.】

item.title: 挪威获得首艘将废碳运往海底储存的船舶
item.description: 在挪威寻求将新生的碳捕集技术转化为商业业务之际，300 亿挪威克朗（27 亿美元）的北海地下碳排放储存计划中的第一艘船抵达挪威。【原文：The first ship in a 30 billion-kroner ($2.7 billion) plan to store emissions under the North Sea arrived in Norway as the country seeks to transform nascent carbon-capture technology into a commercial business.】

item.title: 越南制定宏伟核电目标助推经济增长
item.description: 越南正式批准了一项核电发展计划，目标是在未来十年内使一座反应堆投入运行，这是一项雄心勃勃的战略，旨在提高能源安全并实现积极的经济增长目标。【原文：Vietnam formally approved a nuclear power development plan with the aim of having a reactor online in the next decade, an ambitious strategy to lift energy security and meet aggressive economic growth targets.】
